name: setInstallMode
description: This method enables or disables the pairing mode for all device families if supported by the device family.
signatures: Void setInstallMode(Integer familyId, Boolean on, Integer duration)

parameters.name: on
parameters.description: When true pairing mode will be enabled, otherwise disabled.

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: The duration in seconds the central should stay in pairing mode. Minimum is 5 seconds, maximum is 3600 seconds. Default is 60 seconds.

parameters.name: familyId
parameters.description: ID of the family to enable pairing mode for. If not specified pairing mode will be enabled for all device families.
